title: How to Make Jamaican Sweet Potato Pudding

steps.headline: Peel, cut and grate sweet potatoes and place in a large mixing bowl.
Add dark sugar, flour and raisins.
steps.description: Combine the coconut milk powder with water, mix well and add to the sweet potato mixture.

steps.headline: Add melted margarine, nutmeg, mixed spice, ground ginger, salt, cinnamon powder, vanilla, rum, lime juice and mix well.
Scrape mixture into a greased 10 inch (25.4 cm) baking tin.
Bake in a preheated oven 350 F or 180 °C (356 °F) for 1 1/2 - 1 3/4 hours.
Place sugar in a saucepan on low flame.
steps.description: Add butter or margarine and mix together with coconut milk. Add rum and vanilla. Simmer for 5 minutes or until it gets syrupy. Drizzle over pudding and serve.

text: Peel, cut and grate sweet potatoes and place in a large mixing bowl.  Add dark sugar, flour and raisins. Combine the coconut milk powder with water, mix well and add to the sweet potato mixture. Add melted margarine, nutmeg, mixed spice, ground ginger, salt, cinnamon powder, vanilla, rum, lime juice and mix well.  Scrape mixture into a greased 10 inch (25.4 cm) baking tin.  Bake in a preheated oven 350 F or 180 °C (356 °F) for 1 1/2 - 1 3/4 hours.  Place sugar in a saucepan on low flame. Add butter or margarine and mix together with coconut milk. Add rum and vanilla. Simmer for 5 minutes or until it gets syrupy. Drizzle over pudding and serve. Finished.
